title: The Exam Performance Standard Scale
original_question: In a competitive midterm exam for STAT 124, the class average score was 72 points with a standard deviation of 8 points. A student named Alex received his result and found his Z-score was $Z = 2.0$. Alex's friend, Jordan, received a Z-score of $Z = -1.59$. Alex claims that since his Z-score is 2.0, he scored exactly 2 points higher than the average. Meanwhile, the professor notes that Jordan's score is considered "unusual" because it falls below a certain threshold. Evaluate Alex's claim and explain the meaning of Jordan's score.

segments.text: In a competitive midterm exam for STAT 124, the class average score was 72 points with a standard deviation of 8 points.
segments.highlight_text: average score was 72 points with a standard deviation of 8 points
segments.explanation: 均值衡量中心趋势，标准差衡量观测值偏离均值的典型距离。

segments.text: A student named Alex received his result and found his Z-score was $Z = 2.0$.
segments.explanation: Z 的本质是一个“标准刻度”，告诉我们数值偏离中心点（均值）多少个标准差。

segments.text: Alex claims that since his Z-score is 2.0, he scored exactly 2 points higher than the average.
segments.explanation: 这是典型错误。$Z = 2.0$ 意味着比平均水平高出 2 个“标准差”，而不是 2 分。

segments.text: Alex's friend, Jordan, received a Z-score of $Z = -1.59$.
segments.explanation: 负值意味着数值比平均水平低 1.59 个标准差。

segments.text: Meanwhile, the professor notes that Jordan's score is considered "unusual" because it falls below a certain threshold.
segments.explanation: 在标准化刻度下，通常用 $|Z| \ge 2$（或接近 2）作为“异常/不寻常”的经验阈值来识别极端值。

traps.title: The Raw Units Trap
traps.description: 学生常将 Z 分数（标准差单位）误认为原始数据单位。$Z = 2.0$ 代表高出 2 个标准差，而非 2 分。

solution.step_desc: 识别 Z 分数本质
solution.content: Z 衡量的是偏离均值的标准差倍数：$Z = \frac{x-\mu}{\sigma}$。
solution.source_label: 外部核心知识：Z-score 定义

solution.step_desc: 纠正 Alex 的错误并计算原始分数
solution.content: 若 $Z = 2.0$，则 $x = \mu + Z\sigma = 72 + 2 \times 8 = 88$。Alex 不是高 2 分，而是高 16 分。
solution.source_label: 代入题干已知：Mean=72, SD=8, Z=2.0

solution.step_desc: 解释 Jordan 的分数含义
solution.content: Jordan 的 $Z = -1.59$ 表示他比平均分低 $1.59$ 个标准差：$x = 72 + (-1.59)\times 8 = 59.28$（约 59.3 分）。是否“不寻常”取决于课程采用的阈值规则。
solution.source_label: 代入题干已知：Mean=72, SD=8, Z=-1.59

title: The Campus Cafe Satisfaction Study
original_question: A student group wants to investigate the satisfaction level of all 25,000 students at a large university regarding the campus cafe. Due to limited time, they randomly selected 500 students who were dining at the cafe between 12:00 PM and 1:00 PM on a Tuesday. The group calculated an average satisfaction score of 7.5. They used the symbol $\mu = 7.5$ in their report and concluded that 75% of all students are satisfied. Identify the errors.

segments.text: A student group wants to investigate the satisfaction level of all 25,000 students at a large university regarding the campus cafe.
segments.explanation: 总体（Population）是你真正关心的所有对象，这里是全校 25,000 名学生。

segments.text: Due to limited time, they randomly selected 500 students who were dining at the cafe between 12:00 PM and 1:00 PM on a Tuesday.
segments.highlight_text: 500 students who were dining at the cafe between 12:00 PM and 1:00 PM on a Tuesday
segments.explanation: 即使在该时间段内是随机抽取，也只覆盖“周二中午在咖啡馆就餐的人”，无法代表所有学生，存在覆盖不足/选择偏差风险。

segments.text: The group calculated an average satisfaction score of 7.5.
segments.explanation: 描述样本得到的数值称为统计量（statistic），不是总体参数。

segments.text: They used the symbol $\mu = 7.5$ in their final report to describe this result.
segments.condition: Notation Error: using $\mu$ for a sample value
segments.explanation: $\mu$ 表示总体均值参数；样本均值应使用如 $\bar{x}$ 之类的统计量符号。

segments.text: They concluded that 75% of all students are satisfied.
segments.condition: Unsupported inference from mean to proportion
segments.explanation: 题干给的是“平均满意度 7.5”，却推断成“75% 满意”的比例结论，属于指标混用与过度推断。

traps.title: The Symbol Trap
traps.description: 希腊字母（如 $\mu$, $\sigma$）代表总体参数，样本统计量通常用如 $\bar{x}$、$s$ 表示。

solution.content: 总体是全校 25,000 名学生；样本是“周二 12:00-1:00 在咖啡馆就餐的 500 人”。样本框与总体不一致会引入选择偏差。
solution.source_label: 来自题干定义：总体/抽样方式

solution.content: 7.5 是样本均值（统计量），不应写成 $\mu = 7.5$；应使用如 $\bar{x} = 7.5$。
solution.source_label: 外部核心知识：参数 vs 统计量符号

solution.content: 从“平均满意度 7.5”不能直接推出“75% 满意”。比例结论需要对“满意/不满意”二分类定义并计算样本比例。
solution.source_label: 外部核心知识：指标一致性与推断范围

title: The Sample Size Precision Paradox
original_question: A researcher is constructing a 95% confidence interval for a proportion. With an initial sample size of $n = 400$, the Margin of Error (ME) was 0.05. The researcher wants to cut the ME in half (to 0.025) to make the estimate more precise. Her assistant suggests that they just need to double the sample size to $n = 800$. Evaluate the assistant's suggestion.

segments.text: With an initial sample size of $n = 400$, the Margin of Error (ME) was 0.05.
segments.explanation: 在比例置信区间中，ME 通常等于 $z^* \times SE$，而 $SE$ 与 $n$ 有根号关系。

segments.text: The researcher wants to cut the ME in half (to 0.025) to make the estimate more precise.
segments.explanation: 要让 ME 变小，核心是让 $SE$ 变小，而 $SE$ 取决于样本量。

segments.text: Her assistant suggests that they just need to double the sample size to $n = 800$.
segments.explanation: 这是常见误区：由于 $n$ 在根号下，ME 不会随样本量线性变化。

traps.title: The Square Root Relationship
traps.description: 误差范围要减半，样本量需要扩大为原来的 4 倍，因为 $SE \propto \frac{1}{\sqrt{n}}$。

solution.content: 对比例置信区间，$SE = \sqrt{\frac{p(1-p)}{n}}$，因此 $SE$（进而 ME）与 $\frac{1}{\sqrt{n}}$ 成正比。
solution.source_label: 外部核心知识：比例的标准误公式

solution.content: 若要 ME 减半，则需要 $\sqrt{n}$ 变为原来的 2 倍，因此 $n$ 必须变为原来的 $2^2 = 4$ 倍：$400 \to 1600$。助手的“翻倍到 800”不够。
solution.source_label: 外部核心知识：缩放规律（根号）

title: The Misinterpreted Confidence Interval
original_question: A poll calculates a 95% confidence interval for the proportion of voters to be (0.48, 0.54). A report states: "There is a 95% probability that the true proportion of voters is between 48% and 54%." Is this statement correct based on statistical principles?

segments.text: A poll calculates a 95% confidence interval for the proportion of voters to be (0.48, 0.54).
segments.explanation: 这是一个对总体比例参数的区间估计结果，区间端点来自样本与方法。

segments.text: A report states: "There is a 95% probability that the true proportion of voters is between 48% and 54%."
segments.highlight_text: 95% probability that the true proportion ... is between
segments.condition: Incorrect probability claim about a fixed parameter
segments.explanation: 经典误解：参数是固定常数，不能说“落在该区间的概率是 95%”。

traps.title: The Probability Misconception
traps.description: 置信度描述的是重复抽样下“构造出的区间覆盖真参数”的长期比例，而不是单个已算出的区间包含真值的概率。

solution.content: 总体比例参数是固定的（要么在区间内，要么不在），因此对单次区间不能赋予 95% 的概率意义。
solution.source_label: 外部核心知识：参数固定，概率描述过程

solution.content: 正确表述：如果重复进行抽样并用同样方法构造置信区间，那么这些区间中约 95% 会包含真实比例参数。
solution.source_label: 外部核心知识：95% 置信度的定义

title: The "Not Guilty" Verdict in Statistics
original_question: A researcher tests a new drug. $H_0$ is that the drug has no effect. The resulting $Z$ statistic is 1.20. Since $|1.20| < 1.96$, the researcher concludes: "We have proven that the drug has absolutely no effect ($H_0$ is true)." Evaluate this conclusion.

segments.text: $H_0$ is that the drug has no effect.
segments.highlight_text: $H_0$ is that the drug has no effect
segments.explanation: $H_0$ 通常表示现状/无效应/无差异等基准假设。

segments.text: The resulting $Z$ statistic is 1.20. Since $|1.20| < 1.96$, the researcher concludes...
segments.explanation: 若采用 5% 显著性水平的双侧检验，$|Z| < 1.96$ 通常对应“不拒绝 $H_0$”。

segments.text: "We have proven that the drug has absolutely no effect ($H_0$ is true)."
segments.highlight_text: proven that the drug has absolutely no effect ($H_0$ is true)
segments.explanation: 不拒绝 $H_0$ 只能说明证据不足，而不是“证明 $H_0$ 为真”。

traps.title: The 'Acceptance' Trap
traps.description: 统计学中不说“接受 $H_0$”或证明其正确，只能说“未能拒绝 $H_0$”（证据不足）。

solution.content: 由于 $|Z| = 1.20 < 1.96$，统计决策应为 Fail to reject $H_0$（在该显著性水平下证据不足）。
solution.source_label: 来自题干：给定 Z 值与阈值比较

solution.content: 正确表述应为：目前样本证据不足以支持“药物有效”，但也不能据此证明“药物绝对无效”。
solution.source_label: 外部核心知识：统计推断语言规范

title: The Sample Spread Calculation
original_question: A small dataset $\{2, 4, 6\}$ is used to estimate the standard deviation of a population. A student calculates the variance by dividing the sum of squared deviations by $n = 3$. The professor says this will underestimate the true population spread. Why?

segments.text: A small dataset $\{2, 4, 6\}$ is used to estimate the standard deviation of a population.
segments.highlight_text: estimate the standard deviation of a population
segments.condition: Sample used for inference about population spread
segments.explanation: 用样本去估计总体离散程度时，需要使用无偏（或更合理）的估计方式来避免系统性低估。

segments.text: A student calculates the variance by dividing the sum of squared deviations by $n = 3$.
segments.highlight_text: dividing the sum of squared deviations by $n = 3$
segments.explanation: 样本方差用 $n$ 作分母会偏小；常用 $n-1$ 进行贝塞尔校正以减小低估。

traps.title: The n vs n-1 Trap
traps.description: 计算样本方差/标准差用于估计总体时，分母通常用 $n-1$ 而不是 $n$，否则会系统性低估离散程度。

solution.content: 当用样本估计总体方差时，常用 $s^2 = \frac{\sum (x_i-\bar{x})^2}{n-1}$ 而不是除以 $n$。
solution.source_label: 外部核心知识：样本方差公式

solution.content: 样本均值 $\bar{x}$ 是由样本本身计算出来的，会让偏差平方和相对“更小”；用 $n-1$ 是为了补偿这种低估（贝塞尔校正）。
solution.source_label: 外部核心知识：Bessel's correction 原理
